pages.about: About EliteEscape: A Legacy of Luxury and Hospitality EliteEscape 18+ Home About us Casino Сontact About Our Hotel 01 who we are Experience Elegance and Comfort EliteEscape, where luxury seamlessly blends with tranquility in the heart of the city. Conveniently nestled in a prime location, our hotel offers a peaceful retreat with easy access to vibrant attractions and cultural landmarks. Step into a world of elegance with our exquisitely designed rooms and suites. Each space is meticulously crafted to deliver unparalleled comfort and style, featuring contemporary amenities and luxurious furnishings. Indulge in culinary delights at our exceptional onsite restaurants, where our talented chefs skillfully prepare dishes that tantalize the palate. Whether you crave international flavors or local specialties, our dining venues promise a memorable gastronomic journey. Hospitality is at the core of Shale Hotel. Our dedicated team ensures personalized service with meticulous attention to every detail, ensuring your stay is seamless and delightful. Recharge and rejuvenate at our comprehensive wellness center, complete with state-of-the-art facilities including a spa, fitness center, and indoor pool. Whether you seek a relaxing massage or an energizing workout, we cater to all your wellness needs. Plan successful meetings, conferences, or special events in our versatile event spaces. Equipped with modern amenities and supported by professional event planning services, we specialize in creating memorable gatherings tailored to your unique requirements. Unparalleled Luxury Experience a new benchmark of luxury at EliteEscape Casino & Hotel. Our meticulously curated rooms and suites redefine comfort and elegance, boasting top-tier amenities and sophisticated decor. From the moment you enter our hotel, you'll immerse yourself in the pinnacle of indulgence and relaxation, ensuring an unforgettable stay that surpasses all expectations. Exceptional Service At EliteEscape, our devoted staff is dedicated to delivering an unparalleled level of service. We take pride in our meticulous attention to detail and personalized approach, ensuring every guest feels esteemed and well-cared for. Whether it's a special request or a simple need, our team stands ready to assist, ensuring your stay is seamless and enjoyable. Prime Location Ideally situated in the heart of the city, EliteEscape Casino & Hotel offers effortless access to premier attractions, shopping, dining, and entertainment. Our central location allows you to explore the city's finest offerings just moments from your accommodation. Whether you're visiting for business or leisure, you'll find everything conveniently within reach, making EliteEscape the ultimate choice for your accommodation needs. 02 Advantages Advantages at a Glance 01 Discover our prime location in the heart of downtown, offering convenient access to shopping, dining, and cultural attractions. Whether you're here for business or leisure, explore everything the city has to offer just steps away from our doorstep. 02 Enjoy personalized service from our attentive staff who are dedicated to ensuring your every need is met. From arranging special requests to providing local insights, we strive to create a memorable and seamless experience for every guest. 03 Immerse yourself in luxury with our elegantly appointed rooms and suites, featuring modern amenities and breathtaking views. Whether you're relaxing after a day of exploring or preparing for a productive day ahead, indulge in comfort and sophistication at every turn. 03 Team Our Dedicated Team: Committed to Excellence John Smith General Manager Work Experience: 15 years Emily Johnson Head Chef Work Experience: 12 years Sarah Brown Guest Relations Manager Work Experience: 8 years Michael Lee Chief Engineer Work Experience: 10 years 05 news Hotel News Grand Opening Celebration: Unveiling EliteEscape's Newest Addition Join us as we celebrate the grand opening of our latest addition at EliteEscape. Experience the epitome of luxury with our new rooms and suites, designed to exceed expectations with modern amenities and stylish decor. Be part of this milestone event and indulge in an unforgettable stay at our prestigious hotel. Sustainability Initiatives at EliteEscape: Commitment to Environmental Responsibility Discover how EliteEscape is leading the way in sustainability with our new initiatives. From eco-friendly practices to green certifications, we're dedicated to minimizing our environmental footprint while providing exceptional hospitality. Learn more about our efforts and join us in preserving the planet for future generations. Home About us Casino Сontact Privacy policy Terms and conditions Disclaimer 18+ © 2024 EliteEscape. All rights reserved.
pages.casino: EliteEscape Casino: Where Excitement Meets Elegance EliteEscape 18+ Home About us Casino Сontact Casino Of Our Hotel Discover the heart-pounding excitement of the casino at our hotel, where entertainment and luxury converge in an unforgettable experience. Whether you're a seasoned player or a novice seeking thrills, our casino offers a variety of games to suit every preference. From classic table games like blackjack and roulette to cutting-edge slot machines with innovative features, there's something for everyone to enjoy. Our friendly dealers and attentive staff create an inviting atmosphere, ensuring your time at the casino is both enjoyable and memorable. Immerse yourself in the vibrant ambiance of our casino floor, where the allure of winning meets the sophistication of a luxury resort. Step into a world of opulence and excitement as you explore our beautifully designed gaming areas. With state-of-the-art technology and impeccable service, we strive to provide an unparalleled gaming experience. Whether you're celebrating a special occasion with friends or looking to test your luck solo, our casino promises an electrifying environment that captures the essence of upscale entertainment. Indulge in the thrill of high-stakes gaming at our hotel's prestigious casino, where luxury meets excitement. Our exclusive VIP lounge offers a secluded retreat for discerning guests seeking privacy and personalized service. Enjoy premium amenities and dedicated concierge assistance as you play your favorite games in an intimate setting. From private tables to bespoke experiences tailored to your preferences, our VIP lounge elevates your casino experience to new heights of sophistication and exclusivity. Experience the allure of our hotel's casino, where every moment is infused with anticipation and possibility. Whether you're savoring a cocktail at the bar or placing bets at the gaming tables, our casino offers a dynamic atmosphere that captivates guests from around the world. Discover the thrill of live entertainment and special events hosted in our casino, adding an extra layer of excitement to your stay. With a commitment to excellence and a passion for hospitality, we invite you to indulge in the luxury and excitement of our esteemed casino. 01 Casino Experience at Shale Hotel Royal Flush Poker Challenge the odds with Royal Flush Poker, where strategy meets excitement! Test your skills against seasoned players in our exclusive poker room. Whether you're a novice or a pro, our tables await you for an exhilarating round of Texas Hold'em or Omaha. Experience the thrill of the perfect hand and aim for the ultimate win at EliteEscape Casino. Lucky 7 Slots Spin your way to fortune with Lucky 7 Slots! Step into a world of flashing lights and spinning reels where luck is on your side. From classic three-reel slots to modern video slots with multiple paylines, there's a game for every slot enthusiast. Explore our vibrant casino floor and discover why Lucky 7 Slots is a favorite among our guests. Blackjack Blitz Take on the dealer and beat the house in Blackjack Blitz! Test your card counting skills and strategic thinking in this fast-paced casino classic. Whether you prefer traditional blackjack or innovative variants like Pontoon or Spanish 21, you'll find the perfect table to challenge your luck and strategy. Roulette Royale Dive into the elegance of Roulette Royale, where the spin of the wheel holds the key to your fortune. Place your bets on red or black, odd or even, and experience the thrill of watching the ball land on your lucky number. With multiple betting options and sophisticated gameplay, Roulette Royale offers an unforgettable casino experience. Baccarat Bonanza Join the excitement at Baccarat Bonanza, a game of skill and chance beloved by high rollers worldwide. Predict whether the player or banker will have the winning hand, or bet on a tie for a higher payout. With its simple rules and suspenseful gameplay, Baccarat Bonanza promises non-stop entertainment and big wins. Craps Craze Roll the dice and feel the adrenaline rush of Craps Craze! Cheer on the shooter as they aim for a winning roll, or take your turn to throw the dice yourself. Navigate through a variety of betting options and embrace the social atmosphere of this lively casino favorite. Craps Craze is where luck meets camaraderie for an electrifying gaming experience. Our Achievements: Celebrating Excellence at Shale Hotel Award-Winning Hospitality Shale Hotel is honored to receive the prestigious Hospitality Excellence Award for our commitment to exceptional service and guest satisfaction. This recognition reflects our dedication to providing memorable experiences for every guest. Sustainable Practices Recognition We are proud to be recognized for our sustainable practices with the Green Hotel Certification. Shale Hotel's initiatives in energy efficiency and waste reduction contribute to a greener future while ensuring comfort and luxury for our guests. Culinary Excellence Our culinary team at Shale Hotel celebrates winning the Gourmet Cuisine Award for creativity and quality in dining experiences. From exquisite flavors to impeccable presentation, we continue to delight guests with every dish. Top-Rated Spa Experience Experience relaxation at its finest with our spa awarded the Best Wellness Retreat title. Shale Hotel's spa offers rejuvenating treatments and serene surroundings, providing guests with a blissful escape from everyday stresses. 02 Gallery Immerse yourself in the captivating visuals of Shale Hotel through our carefully curated gallery. Discover the essence of luxury and sophistication in every image, showcasing our elegantly designed rooms and suites, exquisite dining experiences, state-of-the-art facilities, and the serene ambiance of our surroundings. Whether you're planning your stay or reminiscing about your visit, our gallery invites you to experience the allure and charm of Shale Hotel from wherever you are. 03 Blog Hotel Blog Exploring Local Culture: Hidden Gems Near EliteEscape Dive into our blog post exploring the vibrant local culture surrounding EliteEscape. Discover hidden gems, from historic landmarks to charming local markets, offering a glimpse into the rich heritage of our destination. Uncover unique experiences that await just beyond our doors. Seasonal Delights: Culinary Adventures at EliteEscape Join us as we delve into the culinary wonders available at EliteEscape throughout the seasons. From seasonal delicacies to chef-inspired creations, our blog highlights the gastronomic delights that await guests. Explore our dining offerings and tantalize your taste buds with exquisite flavors. Wellness Escapes: Rejuvenation at EliteEscape Spa Embark on a journey of wellness and relaxation at the EliteEscape Spa. Our blog post explores the rejuvenating treatments and wellness experiences available, providing insights into how guests can unwind and rejuvenate during their stay. Discover the ultimate sanctuary for mind, body, and soul. Age Restriction Notice - Access Limited to Adults Only Welcome to EliteEscape Casino & Hotel. Please be advised that this website and its services are intended for adults aged 18 years and older. We take responsible gambling seriously and enforce strict policies to ensure that our services are not accessed by individuals under the legal gambling age. pages.index: Welcome to EliteEscape - Your Ultimate Destination for Luxury and Leisure EliteEscape 18+ Home About us Casino Сontact Discover the Pinnacle of Luxury at EliteEscape At EliteEscape, we provide an exceptional combination of luxurious accommodations and exhilarating entertainment. Our resort is meticulously crafted to offer a memorable getaway, whether you choose to unwind in our opulent rooms, savor exquisite gourmet dining, or try your luck at our world-class casino. Experience the ultimate escape where elegance and excitement seamlessly merge. Luxurious Accommodations At EliteEscape, our rooms and suites are designed with your comfort in mind. Each space is elegantly appointed with premium amenities, offering a sanctuary of relaxation and sophistication. Whether you choose a cozy room or a lavish suite, you'll experience the ultimate in luxury. World-Class Our state-of-the-art offers an exhilarating gaming experience for all our guests. With a wide variety of games, from classic table games to the latest slot machines, there's something for every player. Enjoy the thrill of winning in a sophisticated and vibrant environment. Gourmet Dining Indulge in a culinary journey at EliteEscape's gourmet restaurants. Our chefs create exquisite dishes using the finest ingredients, ensuring every meal is a memorable experience. From fine dining to casual eateries, our diverse dining options cater to every taste and preference. 01 Shale hotel intro Welcome to Shale Hotel: A Fusion of Comfort and Elegance Discover the Unique Charm of Shale Hotel At Shale Hotel, we blend modern luxury with timeless elegance to create an unforgettable stay. Our commitment to exceptional service and sophisticated amenities ensures that every guest enjoys a unique and personalized experience. Elegant Accommodations Exceptional Dining Unparalleled Hospitality 02 Featured properties Discover Our Premier Offerings The Royal Suite Experience the pinnacle of luxury in our Royal Suite, featuring expansive living spaces, a private balcony with stunning views, and top-of-the-line amenities. Perfect for those seeking an opulent retreat. $39/ Night The Executive Room Designed for business travelers, our Executive Room offers a perfect blend of comfort and functionality. Enjoy a spacious work area, high-speed internet, and access to exclusive business services. $54/ Night The Deluxe Room Relax in style in our Deluxe Room, which combines elegant decor with modern conveniences. Ideal for leisure travelers, this room provides a cozy atmosphere with premium bedding and a luxurious bathroom. $108/ Night 03 about us Your Gateway to Luxury and Comfort At Shale Hotel, we are dedicated to providing an exceptional experience for every guest. Our commitment to luxury, comfort, and personalized service sets us apart. Nestled in a prime location, Shale Hotel offers a tranquil retreat with easy access to local attractions. Our elegant accommodations, world-class dining options, and attentive staff ensure that your stay with us is unforgettable. Whether you're here for business or leisure, Shale Hotel promises a seamless blend of sophistication and hospitality. Discover a place where every detail is crafted to make you feel at home. Exceptional Hospitality Enjoy unparalleled hospitality at EliteEscape, where every guest is treated with warmth and professionalism. Our dedicated staff ensures that your every need is met, from seamless check-in to personalized concierge services. Experience hospitality redefined. Impeccable Housekeeping Our commitment to cleanliness and comfort is evident in our impeccable housekeeping services. Rest assured that your room will be spotless and inviting, allowing you to relax and unwind in a pristine environment. Efficient Room Service Indulge in the convenience of our efficient room service, available around the clock. Whether you crave a late-night snack or a gourmet meal in the comfort of your room, our attentive staff ensures prompt and delicious service. Concierge Excellence Our concierge team is dedicated to enhancing your stay with insider knowledge and personalized recommendations. From booking local tours to securing exclusive reservations, they are here to ensure your experience is seamless and unforgettable. State-of-the-Art Facilities Explore our state-of-the-art facilities designed for your enjoyment and convenience. From our fully equipped fitness center to our rejuvenating spa services, EliteEscape offers everything you need to unwind and rejuvenate. Innovative Technology Embrace the future with our innovative technology solutions throughout the hotel. Stay connected with high-speed internet access, enjoy smart room features, and experience the latest in digital entertainment. At EliteEscape, we blend luxury with modern convenience seamlessly. 04 Services Our Services At Shale Hotel, we pride ourselves on providing a comprehensive range of services designed to elevate your experience with us. Whether you're visiting for business or leisure, our dedicated team is committed to ensuring your comfort and satisfaction throughout your stay. Luxurious Spa Retreat Indulge in a serene escape at our luxurious spa, where tranquility meets rejuvenation. Our skilled therapists offer a variety of treatments designed to refresh both body and mind, ensuring a blissful experience that leaves you feeling revitalized and pampered. Gourmet Dining Experience Immerse yourself in a culinary journey at EliteEscape's gourmet dining venues. From fine dining restaurants showcasing exquisite flavors to casual eateries offering delectable local and international cuisines, every meal is a celebration of taste and quality. Exclusive Event Planning Elevate your special occasions with our exclusive event planning services. Whether it's a corporate gathering or a private celebration, our experienced team ensures meticulous planning and flawless execution, tailored to exceed your expectations and create lasting memories. What our Guests say about us "Absolutely luxurious! The attention to detail at Shale Hotel is impeccable. From the elegant decor to the exceptional service, every moment felt like a dream." Emily Johnson Guest "The perfect blend of comfort and sophistication. Shale Hotel exceeded all my expectations. I can't wait to return!" Michael Smith Guest "A sanctuary in the heart of the city. The staff at Shale Hotel made me feel like a VIP throughout my stay. Highly recommended!" Sarah Brown Guest 05 Gallery Our gallery Explore the elegance and charm of Shale Hotel through our curated gallery. Immerse yourself in a visual journey showcasing the luxurious accommodations, stunning architecture, and vibrant ambiance that define our hotel. 06 news Hotel News New Dining Experience Unveiled We are excited to announce the launch of our latest dining concept at Shale Hotel. Indulge in a culinary journey with our innovative menu crafted by renowned chefs, complemented by a stylish and inviting atmosphere. Sustainability Initiatives at Shale Hotel At Shale Hotel, we are committed to sustainability. We are proud to introduce new eco-friendly practices throughout our operations, including energy-efficient technologies and responsible sourcing initiatives. Exclusive Packages for Your Next Getaway Discover our new exclusive packages designed to enhance your stay at Shale Hotel. Whether you're planning a romantic escape or a family vacation, our packages offer exceptional value with added perks and benefits. Rooms & Appartments Deluxe King Suite Experience the height of luxury in our Deluxe King Suite. This spacious room features a plush king-size bed, a separate sitting area, and a modern bathroom with a soaking tub. Enjoy stunning views of the city skyline from your private balcony, and unwind in an elegantly designed space that combines comfort with sophistication. Ocean View Double Room Wake up to breathtaking ocean views in our Ocean View Double Room. Perfect for families or friends traveling together, this room offers two comfortable double beds and a cozy seating area. The modern amenities and chic decor create a serene atmosphere, making it an ideal retreat after a day of exploring or gaming. Executive Business Apartment Designed for the discerning business traveler, our Executive Business Apartment provides a perfect blend of functionality and style. Equipped with a spacious work desk, high-speed internet, and a separate living area, this apartment ensures you stay productive while enjoying the comforts of home. Relax in the luxurious bedroom and take advantage of our top-tier services. Garden Terrace Suite Step into tranquility with our Garden Terrace Suite, featuring a private terrace that opens onto lush gardens. This suite boasts a spacious bedroom with a king-size bed, a beautifully appointed bathroom, and a cozy living area. Enjoy a peaceful retreat where you can sip your morning coffee surrounded by nature's beauty. Penthouse Loft Indulge in the ultimate luxury experience with our Penthouse Loft. This expansive suite offers panoramic views of the city and ocean, a fully equipped kitchen, and a stylish living area with floor-to-ceiling windows. The loft bedroom, with its deluxe king-size bed and en-suite bathroom, provides a serene escape from the bustling casino below. Family Suite Our Family Suite is perfect for those traveling with children or in larger groups. It features two interconnected bedrooms, each with its own bathroom, and a shared living area. Kids and adults alike will appreciate the space and amenities designed to cater to the needs of all ages. Enjoy a comfortable and convenient stay with your loved ones at EliteEscape. Contact Us 01 Get in touch Contact Information Reach Out to Shale Hotel for Your Every Need For any inquiries, reservations, or assistance, please don't hesitate to contact us. Our dedicated team at Shale Hotel is available around the clock to address your needs and ensure your stay exceeds expectations. Reach out to us via phone, email, or visit our website to explore more about our accommodations, amenities, and services. We look forward to welcoming you to Shale Hotel and assisting you with anything you may require for a memorable stay. pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - EliteEscape EliteEscape 18+ Home About us Casino Сontact Privacy Policy We may collect and use aggregate information and statistics about our guests and website visitors for purposes such as analyzing trends, improving our services, and marketing. This information does not identify individual users and is used in a way that ensures your privacy is protected. You have the option to control the collection of certain types of data, such as cookies and tracking technologies, through your browser settings or by opting out using the tools provided on our website. However, disabling these features may affect your ability to use some parts of our website. EliteEscape Hotel retains personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected, including legal, accounting, or reporting requirements. When personal information is no longer needed, we securely delete or anonymize it. EliteEscape Hotel implements industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. These measures include encryption, firewalls, and secure server facilities. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security. We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this privacy policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. When we no longer need your information, we securely delete or anonymize it. Our website uses cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze trends, administer the website, and track users' movements around the site. Cookies are also used to remember your preferences and settings, such as language and currency preferences, to make your future visits more convenient. In the unlikely event of a data breach that compromises your personal information, EliteEscape Hotel will notify affected individuals in accordance with applicable legal requirements. We will take immediate action to mitigate any potential harm and prevent future breaches. We regularly review and update our privacy policy to ensure its effectiveness in protecting your privacy rights and complying with legal requirements. Updates to this policy will be posted on our website, and we encourage you to review it periodically. EliteEscape@gmail.com. EliteEscape Hotel complies with all applicable laws and regulations regarding the collection, use, and protection of personal information. This includes compliance with GDPR for guests from the European Union and similar data protection laws in other jurisdictions. You have the right to access and correct your personal information held by EliteEscape Hotel. If you would like to review, update, or delete your information, please contact us using the contact details provided at the end of this privacy policy. Your personal information may be transferred to, stored, and processed in countries outside of your own, where our servers or service providers are located. These countries may have data protection laws that differ from those in your jurisdiction. By using our services, you consent to the transfer of your information to these countries. EliteEscape Hotel reserves the right to update or modify this privacy policy at any time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the updated policy on our website with a new effective date. We encourage you to review this policy periodically for any updates. EliteEscape Hotel employs administrative, technical, and physical security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. These measures include encryption of sensitive data, secure storage, and restricted access to personal information. Home About us Casino Сontact Privacy policy Terms and conditions Disclaimer 18+ © 2024 EliteEscape. All rights reserved.
